cgcloud__CP_Pricing_Condition_Stage__c.name: cgcloud__CP_Pricing_Condition_Stage__c
cgcloud__CP_Pricing_Condition_Stage__c.description: Staging table for conditions that complex pricing uses.

cgcloud__Denominator__c.description: Defines a denominator for the condition.

cgcloud__External_Id__c.description: SAP or ERP Condition record number.

cgcloud__Key_10__c.description: Key of the used Key Type.

cgcloud__Key_9__c.description: Key of the used Key Type.

cgcloud__Keys_Hash_Code__c.description: Hash code of all columns that can be used to build the merge key in the target table.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales organization to which the key condition belongs.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Controls the sequence of complex pricing conditions.

cgcloud__Status__c.description: State of the pricing condition stage.

cgcloud__Threshold_Unit__c.description: Unit for which thresholds (scales) are defined.
